title: Motion in 2D - projectile launched at diff angles

content.question: A projectile is launched vertically with an initial speed of <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and reaches a maximum height of <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>h</mi></math>. A second, identical projectile is then launched with the same initial speed at an angle of <math alttext="30 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mn>30</mn><mo>âˆ˜</mo></msup></math> above horizontal. What maximum height does the second projectile reach?

topic.text: 1.5: Motion in Two or Three Dimensions

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
